name: Wizard's Spellbook
oracle_text:
{T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Roll a d20. Activate only as a sorcery.
1-9 | Copy that card. You may cast the copy.
10-19 | Copy that card. You may cast teh copy by paying {1} rather than paying its mana cost.
20 | Copy each card exiled with Wizard's Spellbook. You may cast any number of the copies without paying their mana costs.

name: Rimeshield Frost Giant
oracle_text: Ward {3} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {3}.)

name: Goblin Javelineer
oracle_text:
Haste

name: Power of Persuasion
oracle_text:
Choose target creature an opponent controls, then roll a d20.
1-9 | Return it to its owner's hand.
10-19 | Its owner puts it on the top of bottom of their library.

name: Bag of Holding
oracle_text:
Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
{2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Bag of Holding: Return all cards exiled with Bag of Holding to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: Leave no treasure behind.

name: Goblin Javelineer
oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever Goblin Javelineer becomes blocked, it deals 1 damage to target creature blocking it.
flavor_text: Hate only gets you so far. A pointy stick can close the rest of the distance.

name: "Lurking Roper"
oracle_text:
"Lurking Roper" doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap "Lurking Roper".

name: "Lurking Roper"
oracle_text:
"Lurking Roper" doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever you gain life, untap "Lurking Roper".

name: Hired Hexblade
oracle_text: When Hired Hexblade enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text: "I'll take care of it. You just be sure to hold up your end of the deal."

name: Hoarding Ogre
oracle_text:
Whenever Hoarding Ogre attacks, roll a d20.
1-9 | Create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
10-19 | Create two Treasure tokens.
20 | Create three Treasure tokens.

name: Jaded Sell-Sword
oracle_text: When Jaded Sell-Sword enters the battlefield, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast it, it gains first strike and haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Today? That'll cost you extra."

name: Brazen Dwarf
oracle_text: Whenever you roll one or more dice, Brazen Dwarf deals 1 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: "My grandmother saved the life of a brass dragon and in return she was given a glimpse of the fire in its heart—a glimpse she passed down to me."

name: Gretchen Tichwillow
oracle_text: {2}{G}{U}: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Hill Giant Herdgorger
oracle_text: When Hill Giant Herdgorger enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: A shepherd's crook is useful for cleaning bits of wool out of the teeth.

name: Gretchen Tichwillow
oracle_text: {2}{G}{U}: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Plant what you wish to see grow. Listen for the stories you want to hear told."

name: Delina, Wild Mage
oracle_text:
Whenever Delina, Wild Mage attacks, choose target creature you control, then roll a d20.
1-14 | Create a tapped and attacking token that's a copy of that creature except it's not legendary and it has "Exile this creature at end of combat."
15-20 | Create one of those tokens. Roll again.

name: Feywild Trickster
oracle_text: Whenever you roll one or more dice, create a 1/1 blue Faerie Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: Unlike most warlocks, those who make pacts with archfey are drawn to pranks and whimsy mores than death and darkness.

name: Swarming Goblins
oracle_text:
When Swarming Goblins enters the battlefield, roll a d20.
1-9 | Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.
10-19 | Create two of those tokens.
20 | Create three of those tokens.

name: Treasure Chest
oracle_text:
{4}, Sacrifice Treasure Chest: Roll a d20.
1 | Trapped! — You lose 3 life.
2-9 | Create five Treasure tokens.
10-19 | You gain 3 life and draw three cards.
20 | Search your library for a card. If it's an artifact card you may put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle.

name: Critical Hit
oracle_text:
Target creature gains double strike until end of turn.
When you roll a natural 20, return Critical Hit from your graveyard to your hand. (A natural 20 is a roll that displays 20 on the die.)
flavor_text: "How do you kill what's already dead? *That's* how."

name: Contact Other Plane
oracle_text:
Roll a d20.
1-9 | Draw two cards.
10-19 | Scry 2, then draw two cards.
20 | Scry 3, then draw three cards.

10-20 | Tap that creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Flying

name: The Deck of Many Things

10-19 | Draw two cards.
20 | Put a creature card from any graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When that creature dies, its owner loses the game.
